quotes.1: I'm Izuku Midoriya. I'll never give up, no matter how hard it gets.
quotes.2: I have to work harder than anyone else to make it!
quotes.3: I’ll save everyone, no matter the cost. Just watch me.

quotes.1: Get out of my way! I’m gonna crush you and make it look easy!
quotes.2: I’m the number one hero! I’ll show you why you can’t stop me!
quotes.3: You’re already done! Watch how I obliterate you!

quotes.1: Hi! I'm Ochaco Uraraka. Let's do our best!
quotes.2: I want to be a hero so I can help my parents.
quotes.3: I'm not going to lose! I'll keep moving forward!

quotes.1: I am Tenya Iida from the prestigious Iida family.
quotes.2: As class representative, I must set an example.
quotes.3: Let's go, Class 1-A! We'll show them our resolve!

quotes.1: I'm Shoto Todoroki. I refuse to use my fathers damn fire quirk.
quotes.2: Look at these hands, these exams are a piece of cake! I got I got this endeavor in my dna!
quotes.3: With Flashfire Fist, I ignite the battle while locking it in frost.

quotes.1: Call me Tsu.
quotes.2: I always say what's on my mind, ribbit.
quotes.3: Let's all get through this together, ribbit!

quotes.1: I'm Minoru Mineta! Nice to meet you!
quotes.2: I just want to be popular with girls!
quotes.3: I can be a hero too, you know!

quotes.1: I'm Momo Yaoyorozu. It's a pleasure.
quotes.2: Strategy is key to victory.
quotes.3: We can win if we work together!

quotes.1: Hey, I'm Denki Kaminari!
quotes.2: I might fry my brain, but I'll give it my all!
quotes.3: Let's electrify this fight!

quotes.1: I'm Eijiro Kirishima! Let's be manly!
quotes.2: Real heroes never give up!
quotes.3: I'll harden my resolve and keep going!

quotes.1: I am Fumikage Tokoyami. My quirk is Dark Shadow.
quotes.2: The darkness is my ally.
quotes.3: Dark Shadow and I will prevail!

quotes.1: I cannot stop twinkling!
quotes.2: My navel laser is dazzling, non?
quotes.3: I shine brightest when it matters most!

quotes.1: I'm Mashirao Ojiro. My quirk is Tail.
quotes.2: I just want to fight fair and square.
quotes.3: I'll keep training and get stronger!

quotes.1: Hi! I'm Toru Hagakure! You can't see me, but I'm here!
quotes.2: Being invisible has its perks!
quotes.3: I'll surprise everyone with my hero moves!

quotes.1: I'm Rikido Sato. I get stronger when I eat sugar.
quotes.2: Time for a sugar rush!
quotes.3: I'll protect my friends with my strength!

quotes.1: I'm Mezo Shoji. My quirk is Dupli-Arms.
quotes.2: I'll use my arms to support everyone.
quotes.3: Teamwork is our greatest strength.

quotes.1: I'm Kyoka Jiro. I like music.
quotes.2: Let's rock this!
quotes.3: I'll show you the power of sound!

quotes.1: I'm Hanta Sero. My quirk is Tape.
quotes.2: I'll stick with you guys!
quotes.3: Let's wrap this up!

quotes.1: I'm Koji Koda... I can talk to animals.
quotes.2: Animals are my friends.
quotes.3: I'll do my best for everyone!

quotes.1: Hey, I'm Mina Ashido! Let's have fun!
quotes.2: Acid powers, coming through!
quotes.3: I'll dance my way to victory!

quotes.1: I don't have a quirk left. But I am still here! HERCULES!
quotes.2: I may be weakened! But I still stand a fight!
quotes.3: Hello! I hear your causing trouble! I am here to stop you! LIKE THE SYMBOL OF PEACE!

quotes.1: Really? I got assigned to this? Do I have to do this?
quotes.2: You think you can use your quirks against me? Think again!
quotes.3: A one trick hero will not survive! Loud cloud died for me to be here!

quotes.1: Decay… everything.
quotes.2: The world must be broken.
quotes.3: Everyone will fall… sooner or later. You just happen to be first.

quotes.1: I am the number two hero! I will surpass All might! You think you can stand in my way?
quotes.2: The number one hero! AND I WILL SHOW THE WORLD WHAT IT TAKES!
quotes.3: This is your best? Pathetic! I will show you what it means to be a hero!

quotes.1: I’ll capture you with my threads!
quotes.2: I am the strongest fabric-wielder!
quotes.3: Your clothes won’t be the only thing I tie up.
